Title: Crystallization of para-Hydrogen: A quantum phase transition at finite temperature?
Abstract: © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.Recent neutron scattering measurements have revealed that para-Hydrogen prepared in its fundamental state solidifies in a crystal that do not show temperature response (temperature independent molecular displacement and first rotational level linewidth as well as negligible thermal expansion). Here, it is argued that such unique behaviour in the crystal phase can be understood if the crystallization is driven by pure quantum fluctuations.
